alert.note: Alert for Morgan; Rich; Summit (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 02 at 5:25PM MDT until August 02 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 600 PM MDT FOR SOUTHERN RICH...NORTHEASTERN MORGAN...NORTHWESTERN SUMMIT AND WESTERN UINTA COUNTIES... At 524 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 21 miles north of Coalville to near Evanston, moving north at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Evanston, Woodruff, Wahsatch, Almy, Emory and Castle Rock. This includes Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 178 and 196. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
